summary:
"The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild" is a 2017 action-adventure game for Nintendo Switch and Wii U. You play as Link, who has lost his memory, trying to save Princess Zelda and stop Calamity Ganon. The game lets you explore a vast, open world called Hyrule, where you can solve puzzles, do side quests, and discover secrets.

Development took five years, with Nintendo wanting to try new things with the Zelda series. They got help from another game company, Monolith Soft. Originally planned for 2015, it was released in 2017. The game was super popular, winning many awards and selling over 33 million copies by 2024. It's even considered one of the best video games ever made. Two related games have been released since.
title: The Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild
